Protocols/DTCollectionViewNonOptionalMan.name: manager
Protocols/DTCollectionViewNonOptionalMan.abstract: Lazily instantiated DTCollectionViewManager instance. When your collection view is loaded, call startManaging(withDelegate:) method and DTCollectionViewManager will take over UICollectionView datasource and delegate.

Protocols/DTCollectionViewManageable.htm.name: collectionView
Protocols/DTCollectionViewManageable.htm.abstract: Collection view, that will be managed by DTCollectionViewManager

Protocols/DTCollectionViewManageable.htm.name: manager
Protocols/DTCollectionViewManageable.htm.abstract: Lazily instantiated DTCollectionViewManager instance. When your collection view is loaded, call startManaging(withDelegate:) method and DTCollectionViewManager will take over UICollectionView datasource and delegate.

Protocols/DTCollectionViewManageable.htm.name: DTCollectionViewManageable
Protocols/DTCollectionViewManageable.htm.abstract: Adopting this protocol will automatically inject manager property to your object, that lazily instantiates DTCollectionViewManager object.

Protocols/DTCollectionViewNonOptionalMan.name: DTCollectionViewNonOptionalManageable
Protocols/DTCollectionViewNonOptionalMan.abstract: This protocol is similar to DTCollectionViewManageable, but allows using non-optional UICollectionView property.

Extensions/SectionModel.html#/s:14DTMode.name: collectionHeaderModel
Extensions/SectionModel.html#/s:14DTMode.abstract: Returns UICollectionView header model for current section

Extensions/SectionModel.html#/s:14DTMode.name: collectionFooterModel
Extensions/SectionModel.html#/s:14DTMode.abstract: Returns UICollectionView footer model for current section

Extensions/SectionModel.html.name: SectionModel
Extensions/SectionModel.html.abstract: Convenience getters and setters for collection view header and footer models, used in UICollectionViewFlowLayout

Enums/DTCollectionViewManagerAnomaly.htm.name: description
Enums/DTCollectionViewManagerAnomaly.htm.abstract: Short description for DTCollectionViewManagerAnomaly. Useful for sending to analytics, which might have character limit.

Enums/DTCollectionViewManagerAnomaly.htm.name: DTCollectionViewManagerAnomaly
Enums/DTCollectionViewManagerAnomaly.htm.abstract: DTCollectionViewManagerAnomaly represents various errors and unwanted behaviors that can happen when using DTTableViewManager class.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManagerAnomalyHa.name: defaultAction
Classes/DTCollectionViewManagerAnomalyHa.abstract: Default action to perform when anomaly is detected. Prints debugDescription of anomaly by default.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManagerAnomalyHa.name: anomalyAction
Classes/DTCollectionViewManagerAnomalyHa.abstract: Action to perform when anomaly is detected. Defaults to defaultAction.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: isManagingCollectionView
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Bool property, that will be true, after startManagingWithDelegate method is called on DTCollectionViewManager.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: memoryStorage
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Implicitly unwrap storage property to MemoryStorage.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: anomalyHandler
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Anomaly handler, that handles reported by DTCollectionViewManager anomalies.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: storage
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Storage, that holds your UICollectionView models. By default, it’s MemoryStorage instance.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: collectionViewUpdater
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Object, that is responsible for updating UICollectionView, when received update from Storage

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: collectionDataSource
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Object, that is responsible for implementing UICollectionViewDataSource protocol

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: collectionDelegate
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Object, that is responsible for implementing UICollectionViewDelegate and UICollectionViewDelegateFlowLayout protocols

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: collectionDragDelegate
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: collectionDropDelegate
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: defaultStorage
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Storage construction block, used by DTCollectionViewManager when it’s created. Returns MemoryStorage by default.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: init(storage:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Creates DTCollectionViewManager. Usually you don’t need to call this method directly, as manager property on DTCollectionViewManageable instance is filled automatically. DTCollectionViewManager.defaultStorage closure is used to determine which Storage would be used by default.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: startManaging(withDelegate:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Call this method before calling any of DTCollectionViewManager methods.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: startManaging(withDelegate:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Call this method before calling any of DTCollectionViewManager methods.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: updateCellClosure()
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Returns closure, that updates cell at provided indexPath.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: updateVisibleCells(_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Updates visible cells, using collectionView.indexPathsForVisibleItems, and update block. This may be more efficient than running reloadData, if number of your data models does not change, and the change you want to reflect is completely within models state.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: coreDataUpdater()
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Returns CollectionViewUpdater, configured to work with CoreDataStorage and NSFetchedResultsController updates.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: configureEvents(for:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Immediately runs closure to provide access to both T and T.ModelType for klass.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: configure(_:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionView requests cellClass in UICollectionViewDataSource.collectionView(_:cellForItemAt:) method and cell is being configured.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: configureHeader(_:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionView requests headerClass in UICollectionViewDataSource.collectionView(_:viewForSupplementaryElementOf:at:) method and header is being configured.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: configureFooter(_:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionView requests footerClass in UICollectionViewDataSource.collectionView(_:viewForSupplementaryElementOf:at:) method and footer is being configured.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: configureSupplementary(_:ofKind:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionView requests supplementaryClass of kind in UICollectionViewDataSource.collectionView(_:viewForSupplementaryElementOf:at:) method and supplementary view is being configured.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: canMove(_:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionViewDelegate.collectionView(_:didSelectItemAt:) method is called for cellClass.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: shouldSelect(_:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionViewDelegate.collectionView(_:shouldSelectItemAt:) method is called for cellClass.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: shouldDeselect(_:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionViewDelegate.collectionView(_:shouldDeselectItemAt:) method is called for cellClass.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: didDeselect(_:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionViewDelegate.collectionView(_:didDeselectItemAt:) method is called for cellClass.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: shouldHighlight(_:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionViewDelegate.collectionView(_:shouldHighlightItemAt:) method is called for cellClass.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: didHighlight(_:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionViewDelegate.collectionView(_:didHighlightItemAt:) method is called for cellClass.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: didUnhighlight(_:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionViewDelegate.collectionView(_:didUnhighlightItemAt:) method is called for cellClass.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: willDisplay(_:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionViewDelegate.collectionView(_:willDisplayCell:forItemAt:) method is called for cellClass.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: willDisplaySupplementaryView(_:forElementKind:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionViewDelegate.collectionView(_:willDisplaySupplementaryView:forElementKind:at:) method is called for supplementaryClass of kind.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: willDisplayHeaderView(_:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionViewDelegate.collectionView(_:willDisplaySupplementaryView:forElementKind:at:) method is called for supplementaryClass of UICollectionElementKindSectionHeader.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: willDisplayFooterView(_:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionViewDelegate.collectionView(_:willDisplaySupplementaryView:forElementKind:at:) method is called for supplementaryClass of UICollectionElementKindSectionFooter.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: didEndDisplaying(_:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionViewDelegate.collectionView(_:didEndDisplaying:forItemAt:) method is called for cellClass.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: didEndDisplayingSupplementaryView(_:forElementKind:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionViewDelegate.collectionView(_:didEndDisplayingSupplementaryView:forElementKind:at:) method is called for supplementaryClass of kind.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: didEndDisplayingHeaderView(_:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionViewDelegate.collectionView(_:didEndDisplayingSupplementaryView:forElementKind:at:) method is called for headerClass of UICollectionElementKindSectionHeader.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: didEndDisplayingFooterView(_:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionViewDelegate.collectionView(_:didEndDisplayingSupplementaryView:forElementKind:at:) method is called for footerClass of UICollectionElementKindSectionFooter.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: shouldShowMenu(for:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionViewDelegate.collectionView(_:shouldShowMenuForItemAt:) method is called for cellClass.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: canPerformAction(for:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionViewDelegate.collectionView(_:canPerformAction:forItemAt:withSender:) method is called for cellClass.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: performAction(for:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed, when UICollectionViewDelegate.collectionView(_:performAction:forItemAt:withSender:) method is called for cellClass.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed to determine cell size in UICollectionViewDelegateFlowLayout.collectionView(_:sizeForItemAt:) method, when it’s called for cell which model is of itemType.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: referenceSizeForHeaderView(withItem:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed to determine header size in UICollectionViewDelegateFlowLayout.collectionView(_:layout:referenceSizeForHeaderViewInSection:) method, when it’s called for header which model is of itemType.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: referenceSizeForFooterView(withItem:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers closure to be executed to determine footer size in UICollectionViewDelegateFlowLayout.collectionView(_:layout:referenceSizeForFooterViewInSection:) method, when it’s called for footer which model is of itemType.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers mapping from model class to cellClass.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: registerNibless(_:mappingBlock:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers mapping from model class to cellClass.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: registerNibNamed(_:for:mappingBlock:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers nib with nibName mapping from model class to cellClass.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: registerHeader(_:mappingBlock:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers mapping from model class to suppplementary view of headerClass type for UICollectionElementKindSectionHeader.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: registerFooter(_:mappingBlock:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers mapping from model class to suppplementary view of footerClass type for UICollectionElementKindSectionFooter.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers mapping from model class to supplementary view of headerClass type with nibName for UICollectionElementKindSectionHeader.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers mapping from model class to supplementary view of footerClass type with nibName for UICollectionElementKindSectionFooter.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Registers mapping from model class to suppplementary view of supplementaryClass type for supplementary kind.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: unregister(_:)

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.name: unregisterSupplementary(_:forKind:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html#/s:.abstract: Unregisters supplementaryClass of kind from DTCollectionViewManager and UICollectionView.

Classes/DTCollectionViewDropPlaceholderC.name: commitInsertion(ofItem:_:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewDropPlaceholderC.abstract: Commits insertion of item, using UICollectionViewDropPlaceholderContext.commitInsertion(_:) method. Both commit and insertionIndexPathClosure will be automatically dispatched to DispatchQueue.main.

Classes/DTCollectionViewDelegateWrapper..name: forwardingTarget(for:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewDelegateWrapper..abstract: Forwards aSelector, that is not implemented by DTCollectionViewManager to delegate, if it implements it.

Classes/DTCollectionViewDelegateWrapper..name: responds(to:)
Classes/DTCollectionViewDelegateWrapper..abstract: Returns true, if DTCollectionViewManageable implements aSelector, or DTCollectionViewManager has an event, associated with this selector.

Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.name: willUpdateContent
Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.abstract: closure to be executed before content is updated

Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.name: didUpdateContent
Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.abstract: closure to be executed after content is updated

Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.name: reloadItemClosure
Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.abstract: Closure to be executed, when reloading an item.

Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.name: animateMoveAsDeleteAndInsert
Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.abstract: When this property is true, move events will be animated as delete event and insert event.

Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.name: batchUpdatesInProgress
Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.abstract: Boolean property, that indicates whether batch updates are completed.

Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.name: storageDidPerformUpdate(_:)
Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.abstract: Updates UICollectionView with received update. This method applies object and section changes in performBatchUpdates method.

Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.name: storageNeedsReloading()
Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html#/s:23.abstract: Call this method, if you want UICollectionView to be reloaded, and beforeContentUpdate: and afterContentUpdate: closures to be called.

Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html.name: CollectionViewUpdater
Classes/CollectionViewUpdater.html.abstract: CollectionViewUpdater is responsible for updating UICollectionView, when it receives storage updates.

Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html.name: DTCollectionViewManager
Classes/DTCollectionViewManager.html.abstract: DTCollectionViewManager manages most of UICollectionView datasource and delegate methods and provides API for managing your data models in the collection view. Any method, that is not implemented by DTCollectionViewManager, will be forwarded to delegate.
